ESPublicQuery.SQL: SELECT ESFIDocumentTrade.GID AS GID, ESFIDocumentTrade.ADCode AS ADCode, ESFIDocumentTrade.ADRegistrationDate AS ADRegistrationDate, ESFIDocumentTrade.fTradeAccountGID AS fTradeAccountGID, FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFITradeAccount.Code AS Code1, FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFITradeAccount.Name AS Name, ESFIDocumentTrade.fTradeAccountSiteGID AS fTradeAccountSiteGID, FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_TradeAccountSite.Code AS Code2, FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_TradeAccountSite.Description AS Description, ESFIDocumentTrade.ADDocumentState AS ADDocumentState, FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFISalesPerson.Code AS Code3, FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFISalesPerson.Name AS Name1, FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIPaymentMethod.Code AS Code4, FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIPaymentMethod.Description AS Description1, ESFIDocumentTrade.ADAlternativeCode AS ADAlternativeCode, ESFIDocumentTrade.ADAlternativeDate AS ADAlternativeDate, ESFIDocumentTrade.DeliveryDueDate AS DeliveryDueDate, ESFIDocumentTrade.fDeliverySiteGID AS fDeliverySiteGID, FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_DeliverySite.Code AS Code5, FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_DeliverySite.Description AS Description2, FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIZShippingMethod.Description AS Description3, ESFIDocumentTrade.fShippingMethodCode AS fShippingMethodCode, ESFIDocumentTrade.fTransporterGID AS fTransporterGID, FK_ESGOPerson_ESFIDocumentTrade_Transporter.Name AS Name2, ESFIDocumentTrade.ADCancelState AS ADCancelState, ESFIDocumentTrade.NetValue AS NetValue, ESFIDocumentTrade.VATValue AS VATValue, ESFIDocumentTrade.ADTotalValue AS ADTotalValue, ESFIDocumentTrade.DiscountValue AS DiscountValue, ESFIDocumentTrade.PayableAmount AS PayableAmount, ESFIDocumentTrade.ADReasoning AS ADReasoning, ESFIDocumentTrade.fWareHouseGID AS fWareHouseGID, FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESGOSites.Code AS Code7, FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESGOSites.Description AS Description4, ESFIDocumentTrade.ADComments AS ADComments, ESFIDocumentTrade.fADSiteGID AS fADSiteGID, FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_ADSite.Code AS Code8, FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_ADSite.Description AS Description5, ESFIDocumentTrade.fTransitionStepCode AS fTransitionStepCode FROM ESFIDocumentTrade AS ESFIDocumentTrade LEFT JOIN ESFIDocumentType AS FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIDocumentType ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fADDocumentTypeGID = FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIDocumentType.GID INNER JOIN ESFITradeAccount AS FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFITradeAccount ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fTradeAccountGID = FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFITradeAccount.GID LEFT JOIN ESGOSites AS FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_TradeAccountSite ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fTradeAccountSiteGID = FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_TradeAccountSite.GID LEFT JOIN ESFISalesPerson AS FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFISalesPerson ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fSalesPersonGID = FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFISalesPerson.GID LEFT JOIN ESFIPaymentMethod AS FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIPaymentMethod ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fPaymentMethodGID = FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIPaymentMethod.GID LEFT JOIN ESGOSites AS FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_DeliverySite ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fDeliverySiteGID = FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_DeliverySite.GID LEFT JOIN ESFIZShippingMethod AS FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIZShippingMethod ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fShippingMethodCode = FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIZShippingMethod.Code LEFT JOIN ESGOPerson AS FK_ESGOPerson_ESFIDocumentTrade_Transporter ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fTransporterGID = FK_ESGOPerson_ESFIDocumentTrade_Transporter.GID LEFT JOIN ESGOSites AS FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESGOSites ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fWareHouseGID = FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESGOSites.GID LEFT JOIN ESGOSites AS FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_ADSite ON ESFIDocumentTrade.fADSiteGID = FK_ESGOSites_ESFIDocumentTrade_ADSite.GID WHERE (ESFIDocumentTrade.fCompanyCode = ##(ESCOMPANY)) AND (FK_ESFIDocumentTrade_ESFIDocumentType.Code = 'ΠΑΡ') AND (ESFIDocumentTrade.ADDocumentState <> 2) AND (ESFIDocumentTrade.ADCancelState = 0) AND (ESEqual(ESFIDocumentTrade.ADRegistrationDate, @ADRegistrationDate))
